title: HELP cant connect to games
body: the last 2 games now i have qued up for and got right to the load screen and it wont go any further. it just gives me the option to reconnect but never does.... im currently in a ranked game just sitting here with my thumb up my @ss because i cant do anything. any help would be appreciated

replies.body: Your specific issue sounds like something is failing to render the game, so it's not loading.  I recommend going over the troubleshooting steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to resolve any driver or bad game files causing this.  Hopefully that will do the trick!

Yeah, I am experiencing the same situation. I've actually been punished for this issue, so just relax a bit, cause it's not worth getting punished for a bug. Try your troubleshooting solutions, then test a custom game so that you don't get punished. If I find a fix that works, I'll let you know. Good luck.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Thanks man, It happened to me after i got ddosed if that helps you.
